title: Interview with Professor Angela McRobbie (Part 1)
description: In this episode, Matthew talks to Professor Angela McRobbie from Goldsmiths University about her early research from the Mid 70s to the late 80s including studies on magazines for girls, female subcultures, women and music/fashion and the issue of moral panics. This podcast forms the first half of a two part interview.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
